name: Soul Stealer (Nate Bradshaw)
description:
You are a robot mind virus trying to escape your captors, with the unique ability of being able to take take control of whom ever kills you.

Controls:

A / D - Left / right
Space - Jump
Mouse - Aim and Shoot
Shift - Use ability
Esc for menu

Created as a slightly rushed submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1, reusing music from L0st Phoen1x
https://twitter.com/L0stPhoen1x 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMCj59lofMorWcpVYTWVwrg
